title: Week 9 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 11/1)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 9 gambling advice, covering all 13 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Pats-Ravens (7:00), Colts-Steelers (12:30), Jags-Texans (16:30), Titans-Panthers (21:15), Bucs-Seahawks (23:45), Packers-Chargers (28:45), Redskins-Bears (37:00), Bills-Eagles (40:30), Vikings-Chiefs (43:30), Jets-Dolphins (48:15), Lions-Raiders (51:35), Browns-Broncos (55:50) and Cowboys-Giants (1:01:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
